39  import os 
40  import sys 
41  import tempfile 
42  
 
43  STDOUT = 1 
44  STDERR = 2 
45  
 

46 -class Redirector(object): 

47 -    def __init__(self, fd=STDOUT): 

48          self.fd = fd 
49          self.started = False 

50  
 

51 -    def start(self): 

52          if not self.started: 
53              self.tmpfd, self.tmpfn = tempfile.mkstemp(suffix='.pyout') 
54  
 
55              if self.fd == STDOUT: 
56                  self.old = sys.stdout 
57                  sys.stdout = os.fdopen(self.tmpfd, 'w+b') 
58              else: 
59                  self.old = sys.stderr 
60                  sys.stderr = os.fdopen(self.tmpfd, 'w+b') 
61  
 
62              self.started = True 

63  
 

64 -    def flush(self): 

65          if self.fd == STDOUT: 
66              sys.stdout.flush() 
67          elif self.fd == STDERR: 
68              sys.stderr.flush() 

69  
 

70 -    def stop(self): 

71          if self.started: 
72              self.flush() 
73              if self.fd == STDOUT: 
74                  sys.stdout.close() 
75                  sys.stdout = self.old 
76              else: 
77                  sys.stderr.close() 
78                  sys.stderr = self.old 
79              tmpr = open(self.tmpfn, 'rb') 
80              output = tmpr.read() 
81              tmpr.close()  # this also closes self.tmpfd 
82              os.remove(self.tmpfn) 
83              self.started = False 
84              return output 
85          else: 
86              return None
